meanings.definition: Containing or stating briefly and concisely.
meanings.sent1: The teacher's compendious explanation made the complex topic easy to understand.
meanings.sent2: She wrote a compendious summary of the novel for her book report.
meanings.sent3: His compendious notes were so short, they fit on a single index card!
meanings.sent4: The compendious guide to gardening was a lifesaver for beginners.
meanings.sent5: The compendious nature of the recipe made it perfect for busy weeknights.
